E18: Motors starting.; Flight mode changed to Starting Motors.
E31: Data Recorder File Index is 83.; Set Return to Home (RTH) altitude to 100 m (328 ft).; Set maximum flight altitude to 500 m (1640 ft).
E27: Flight mode changed to Manual Takeoff.
E24: Adjust antennas and make sure they are perpendicular to flight direction of aircraft.
E5: RTH.; Press Brake button to cancel RTH.; RC signal lost.; No image transmission.
E7: Aircraft returning to home.; Image transmission signal weak.
E10: RTH ascending.; Controller triggered aircraft to descend.
E0: Auto RTH canceled.; RC signal lost.
E3: RC signal weak.; RC signal lost.
E23: Avoid blocking antennas and adjust antenna orientation.
E11: RTH.; Controller triggered aircraft to descend.
E9: Aircraft braking.; Image transmission signal weak.
E32: Aircraft returning to home.; RTH ascending.; Flight mode changed to P-GPS.
E6: Aircraft will follow preset action for lost signal.
E1: Failsafe RTH.; Flight mode changed to Go Home.
E34: Returning to home.; Original route RTH.
E25: Failsafe RTH.; Image transmission signal weak.; RTH in progress.
E14: Returning to home.; RC signal weak.
E28: Failsafe RTH.; Controller triggered aircraft to fly backward.
E17: Gimbal pitch axis endpoint reached.; Aircraft braking.
E12: Returning to home.; RTH in progress.
E30: Controller triggered aircraft to fly backward.
E26: Auto landing in progress.; Press brake button to cancel landing.; Flight mode changed to Auto Landing.
